structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-168. Enforcement.
The enforcement of the provisions in this article and other chapters of the Code pertaining to the placement of bus passenger benches and bus shelters for use of the public whether on private property or public right-of-way shall be the responsibility of the Director of the Miami-Dade Transportation Administration or successor departments.
